edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util
Class BitMath

java.lang.Object
  edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util.BitMath

public class BitMath
extends java.lang.Object

Performs low level bit math operations to read some binary formats.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
